section1.title: news
section1.row1: Click on a link to view a project's live site. Go to the "commercial" section to view a project's flat artwork and details. Slide the scrollbar to browse more news. Click on Prev/Next links to view archived news (to be added).
section1.caption: All about ideations, campaign launches, new gigs, design conferences...

section2.title: advertising
section2.row1: Click on a thumbnail or link to see a project in full view mode. Click on a heart icon to see the project's live site. Slide the scrollbar to browse more artwork.
section2.caption: I believe that a diverse client base leads to fresh, creative, big-idea development.

section3.title: fine art
section3.row1: Click on thumbnail/link for full view. Slide the scrollbar for more work. Click on Prev/ Next in full view for more work.
section3.caption: I experiment with lithography, drawing, painting, illustration, etching...

section4.title: photography
section4.row1: Click on thumbnail/link for full view. Slide the scrollbar for more work. Click on Prev/Next in full view to navigate through large size work.
section4.caption: I shoot mostly for work and sometimes for no reason whatsoever.

section5.title: bio | contact
section5.row1: Download my resume (.doc) for detailed information about my work. Email me at a_constantinescu@hotmail.com with a smashing job offer. I'm based in New York City and would only relocate to Rome. Seriously.
section5.caption: Brand principles, concept design, user experience, technology. I get it.
